name: PORK's woods (DEMO)
description:
STORY

Police officer Duane McLaren, learned about the beating of a nine-year-old girl, Vanessa Tonks, and informed the court about it. The girl was sent to St. Lincoln's Hospital. Soon there is a fire in the Hospital and everyone except the girl escaped and survived.  The next day, the girl's parents mysteriosly die. Upon learning of this, Duane decides to take on this case and invesigate the mystery of PORK's woods...
